Target to 4.3 w/o iteration - awaiting triage.

Seems like a classpath problem. You need to set up the class path pointing to the "org.eclipse.hyades.execution" plugin - primarily the "hexl.jar" file.

Resetting priority to P3 for triaging.
Not containable in 4.3 and retarget to 4.4. Please let me know if you have any concern.
